channel.title: Does anyone have the source somescape?
channel.description:
its a server where you start in edgeville and basically black armor is the best etc..
would be fun if i had this so me and couple of friends can play!

item.title: Does anyone have the source somescape?
item.dc:creator: @DylanAus DylanAus
item.description:
@DylanAus wrote:

The original somescape you start at varrock bank, Initiate armor is the best, then white then black armor which is easiest to acquire.

I don’t believe anyone has released a remake source and Chris and the co-owner are the only 2 people with the original source.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone have the source somescape?
